Detailed Description

The SHMIOP-specific bridge class for the concrete acceptor.

ACE_CString TAO_SHMIOP_Acceptor::host_ [protected]
 

Cache the information about the endpoint serviced by this acceptor. For example it the IP address is INADDR_ANY (0.0.0.0) then there will be possibly a different hostname for each interface.

Todo:
There may in fact be multiple hostnames for this endpoint.

CORBA::Boolean TAO_SHMIOP_Acceptor::lite_flag_ [private]
 

Should we use GIOP lite??

off_t TAO_SHMIOP_Acceptor::mmap_size_ [private]
 

Determine the minimum size of mmap file. This dictate the maximum size of a CORBA method invocation.
